Key Match Events: The Guardians produced an astonishing late comeback to beat the New York Yankees
Jhonkensy Noel forced an extra-inning after a sensational game-tying home run
David Fry proved the hero for Cleveland with a walk-off homer
Pre-Game Insights: Travis Kelce was in attendance for Game 1 of the series on Monday night after heading to Yankee Stadium with girlfriend Taylor Swift
Post-Match Reflections: Travis Kelce was left ecstatic after the Cleveland Guardians' dramatic win on Thursday night
The NFL star wrote on X after the game: 'Playoff baseball baby!!! @CleGuardians have the city absolutely ROCKIN TONIGHT!! What a game!'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into extra innings
The Guardians took a 3-1 lead in the game before surrendering back-to-back home runs to Aaron Judge and Giancarlo Stanton
